channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description: i just tryed to do the javac error tut, but have a small problem i dont know how to set a classpath or whatever u call it as im using 98, i was wondering if anyone could help me[br][size=1]Posted at: August 13, 2006, 06:26:50 AM[/size][hr]still no one that can help?

item.title: Compiling error
item.dc:creator: @xerlot xerlot
item.description:
@xerlot wrote:

hmm i hope this works
right click the compile and click edit and replace everything with

@echo off title XerlotScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe" server pause
let me know if it works

Read full topic
